James Abley wrote:
> On Mon, 07 Mar 2005 19:25:12 -0500, "J. B. Rainsberger"

> Ouch. Where was it you used to work? ;-) A little bird tells me Big Blue...
> 
> http://www-106.ibm.com/developerworks/webservices/library/co-single.html

When I handed out free copies of _JUnit Recipes_ at my old department in 
late 2004, they were /just then/ starting to look at using JUnit to 
automate their unit testing. And even then, they wanted to have a 
/separate team/ automate unit tests, rather than having the programmers 
do it.
-- 
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
